turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a pizza from Papa Joh'ns.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one on in Chatham?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a pizza called The Works but there is no Supreme.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What toppings come on The Works?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pepperoni, Canadian bacon, spicy Italian sausage, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and black olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't like Canadian Bacon. Can I get ground beef instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you can. What size do you want to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the difference in price between a medium and a large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a $2 difference.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will just take a large then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like thin crust or original?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Papa John's has the best crust so I will get original.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like sides or a dessert with this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kinds of sides do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can get chicken wings, breadsticks, or chicken poppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. We will have birthday cake too so I think sides will be too much food.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that will be one large The Works original pizza from the Chatham Papa John's. We are substituting ground beef for Canadian bacon. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizza order is finished and the pizza will be ready to pick up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome.
